description: This file defines a class `WikipediaKnowledgeBase` that inherits from `AgentKnowledge`. It manages a list of topics and generates documents containing Wikipedia summaries for each topic. It imports external modules `wikipedia`, `Document`, and `AgentKnowledge`, and defines a property to iterate over topics and produce document lists.

classes.name: WikipediaKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class that provides Wikipedia summaries for a list of topics, inheriting from `AgentKnowledge`.

methods.name: document_lists
methods.description: A property method that yields lists of `Document` objects, each containing a Wikipedia summary for a topic.
